name: Legacy of Lina
description: Legacy of Lina is a platform / action game. Explore a mysterious place full of enemies and danger in order to find the meaning of the whispers that changed Lina's life forever.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 350 MB available space
